abstract.para: In version 15 SP6, &slehpc; (&slehpca;) was removed as a separate product. The &hpcm; is now available with &sles; (&slsa;). This chapter contains basic information about installing &slsa; for &hpca; use cases, and upgrading from &slehpca; to &slsa;.

sect1.title: Installing &sles; &productnumber; for &hpca;
sect1.para: In addition to the default &sles; modules, make sure the following modules are also enabled:

In &hpc;, systems take on different roles and individual installations vary widely. Therefore, &suse; does not provide predefined system roles with the &hpcm;. We recommend using either the Text Mode or Minimal system role and adding components according to your needs.

sect1.title: Upgrading from &slehpca; to &sles;
sect1.para: In version 15 SP6, the &slehpca; product was removed. The &hpcm; is now available with &sles;.

You can migrate to &slsa; &productnumber; when upgrading from &slehpca; 15 SP5. This migration retains all the software modules and packages that were enabled on &slehpca;. After the migration, the same software selection will be available as on &slehpca;.
